author: Julian E. Barnes
title: Mattis Calls on Turkey to Focus on ISIS Fight Amid Tensions With U.S.
text:
The U.S. has urged Turkey to focus on the fight against Islamic State, an implicit criticism of Ankara’s Syria strategy as tensions run high between the NATO allies.

Relations between Washington and Ankara are strained over Turkey’s offensive against the Kurdish-held enclave of Afrin in northern Syria. Speaking after a North Atlantic Treaty Organization meeting on Thursday, Defense Secretary Jim Mattis said Ankara and Washington were working toward greater transparency with each other. But he acknowledged that the fight between...
